mapper.select: SELECT p.row_no, p.col_no, p.seat_no, p.seat_price, COALESCE(COUNT(DISTINCT b.bid_telno), 0) AS total_bidders, COALESCE(MAX(b.bid_amount), 0) AS current_bid_amount FROM seatprice AS p LEFT JOIN bids AS b ON p.seat_no = b.seat_no AND p.match_no = b.match_no WHERE p.match_no = #{matchNumber} GROUP BY p.row_no, p.col_no, p.seat_no, p.seat_price ORDER BY CAST(p.seat_no AS UNSIGNED) ASC;

SELECT b.seat_no, b.bid_amount, SUM(b.bid_amount) AS total_bid_amount, m.match_name, m.round_name, m.pay_due_datetime, u.username FROM bids AS b JOIN matchs AS m ON b.match_no = m.match_no JOIN biduser AS u ON b.bid_telno = u.telno WHERE b.bid_telno = #{telno} AND b.match_no = #{matchNumber} AND b.bid_won = 'Y' GROUP BY b.seat_no;
mapper.update: UPDATE bids b JOIN ( SELECT seat_no, match_no, MAX(bid_amount) AS max_bid_amount FROM bids WHERE match_no = #{matchNumber} GROUP BY seat_no, match_no ) maxbid ON b.seat_no = maxbid.seat_no AND b.bid_amount = maxbid.max_bid_amount AND b.match_no = maxbid.match_no SET b.bid_won = 'Y';
mapper.select: SELECT b.seat_no, b.bid_amount, b.bid_at, b.bid_won, b.bid_paid, b.bid_pay_method, (SELECT MAX(bid_amount) FROM bids WHERE seat_no = b.seat_no AND match_no = b.match_no) AS highest_bid_amount FROM bids AS b WHERE b.bid_telno = #{telno} AND b.match_no = #{matchNumber} ORDER BY b.bid_at

SELECT b.row_no, b.col_no, b.seat_no, b.bid_amount, b.bid_at, b.bid_won, b.bid_paid, b.bid_pay_method, (SELECT MAX(bid_amount) FROM bids WHERE seat_no = b.seat_no AND match_no = b.match_no) AS highest_bid_amount FROM bids AS b WHERE b.bid_telno = #{telno} AND b.match_no = #{matchNumber} AND b.bid_at = ( SELECT MAX(bid_at) FROM bids WHERE bid_telno = #{telno} AND seat_no = b.seat_no AND match_no = b.match_no ) ORDER BY b.seat_no, b.row_no, b.col_no
SELECT match_no, seat_no, MAX(bid_amount) AS max_bid_amount FROM bids WHERE match_no = #{matchNumber} AND seat_no = #{seatNo} FOR UPDATE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bids (match_no, seat_no, bid_telno, bid_amount, bid_at) VALUES (#{matchNumber}, #{seatNo}, #{telno}, #{bidAmount}, #{bidAt});
